info.description: DL Virtual Captive Platform REST API Integration with External Systems
info.title: VCP REST API Integration

post.description: Get a bearer token by providing the client id and the client secret from the External System.

get.description: View dictionary values for specific dictionaries

parameters.name: key
parameters.description:
'The key of the dictionary. A list is provided in case of failure, which is: 
  ZootPartnerSearchConfig, EnvironmentFriendly, Currency, UsageType, ConditionType, PartnerType, FinancialProduct, FinancialProductType, InterestType, ServiceType, ScheduleType.
All the values from this operation are also covered by the annex *List of Property possible values*.'

post.description: Search partner in DL database based on filters send as parameters. If it isnâ€™t found  in DL database an interrogation to Credit Bureaus is performed to get general partner  data corresponding with the filter. A list of partners (with general information) is returned. This will contain 2 partner categories (one that are from Charisma System (having only *PartnerId*) and another one from Credit Bureau System (having only *Origin* and *BureauId*)).

get.description: Get more detail from a specific partner available in Charisma System. The external system receives all details of the selected partner from Charisma System.

parameters.name: partnerId
parameters.description: Partner identification number from the Charisma System.

get.summary: Get partner by origin and bureauId
get.description: Get more detail from a specific partner available in a Credit Bureau System. This needs to be called when a *PartnerId* is not available. The external system receives all details of the selected partner. These are taken from the Credit Bureau system only if not already present in Charisma System.

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description: The source system of the Partner. Based on this field the system should know from where to retrieve partner data (Charisma System or Credit Bureau System).

parameters.name: bureauId
parameters.description: Partner identification field from the Credit Bureau System.

get.description: Returned the assets list for a specific VCP quote. It can be called progressively  to respect internal logic from VCP. Subsequent calls return only compatible asset  types with those already selected on specific quote. Each subsequent call must preceded by a call for Sync Quote.

parameters.name: currencyId
parameters.description: 'The id of the currency in Charisma System.  Please see the annex *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Currency*, column *Id*. Values can also be found by calling */values/currency* (field: *Id*).'

post.description: This method synthetizes all changes done to a quote. It is sent to VCP all quote data to update the VCP information. If the quote is not created, based on the received information, it will be created in this method.

200.description: Returns the details of a quote.

get.description: Retrieves the asset types that respect the configured conditions and can be added on a specific quote. This conditions are configured by DeutscheLeasing in Charisma System.

Get financial product definitions available for a specific quote.  This is not mandatory to be called as it retrieves financial configuration  restrictions that are used as restrictions in Charisma System.

200.description: Returns all available product type definitions with constranints that can be used on a specific quote.

get.description: The external system receives the calculated schedule plan. The schedule plan  is calculated in VCP based on the offer created by the external system.

200.description: Returns the payment schedule of the quote for the current financial setup.

get.description: Get scoring questions for a specific quote.

200.description: Returns a list of questions in order to have additional informations provided.

post.description: Start approval (indicative approval) of a quote.
Cancel the process of a final approval if this was started.

200.description: Returns the *quoteId* of the quote approval that was cancelled.

post.description: Create a contract for the provided assets.

200.description: Returns the *contractId* and the *contractNumber* of the created contract.

post.description: In order to collect Direct Debits on a bank account, any Creditor needs to get the approval  of the Debtor through the acquisition of a valid SEPA Direct Debit Mandate.

parameters.name: contractId
parameters.description: The id of the contract from Charisma System.

200.description: Returns the *document number* of the created mandate.

get.description: Get a list with the document templates available for download for this quote (with {quoteId}).  Each document template will also contain all the uploaded files. The list will be generated for the default quote product. The default quote product is considered to be the selected product or the first product from the list.

Get a list with the document templates available for download for this quote (with {quoteId}) for the specified product (by {quoteProductId}). Each document template will also contain all the uploaded files.

parameters.name: quoteProductId
parameters.description: The id of the quote product.

post.description: Download a document file by using a document template provided by *getDocuments* operation.

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: The id of the file to be downloaded from Charisma System.  It is provided by the *getDocuments* operation (in *uploadedFiles/fileId*) or by the *uploadDocument* operation (*fileId*).

AnyType.description: Can be any type - string, number, boolean, date.

name.description: Required document template alias from product definition from Charisma System.

assetId.description: The id of the asset from Charisma system. Please see the dictionary values in Annex, excel file *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Asset*, column  *Model Id*

assetCode.description: The code of the asset from Charisma system. Please see the dictionary values in Annex, excel file *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Asset*, column  *Model Code*. This is the id of the model in AME system.

assetName.description: The name of the asset from Charisma system. Please see the dictionary values in Annex, excel file *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Asset*, column  *Model Name*

brandCode.description: The name of the asset brand from the Charisma System.

brandName.description: The name of the asset brand from the Charisma System.

kindOfObjectCode.description: The kind of object code of the asset from Charisma System.

kindOfObjectName.description: The kind of object name of the asset from Charisma System.

ResponseError.description:
"List of errors (errorCode => errorMessage): General.RequestHeaders.MissingContentType                   =>        Mandatory request header 'Content-Type' is missing. General.RequestHeaders.MissingCountryCode                   =>        Mandatory request header 'X-CountryCode' is missing. General.RequestHeaders.InvalidCountryCode                   =>        Request header 'X-CountryCode' value is not valid. General.RequestHeaders.MissingVendorCode                    =>        Mandatory request header 'X-VendorCode' is missing. General.RequestHeaders.InvalidVendorCode                    =>        Request header 'X-VendorCode' value is not valid. General.RequestHeaders.MissingUsername                      =>        Mandatory request header 'X-Username' is missing. General.RequestHeaders.MissingLegalEntity                   =>        Mandatory request header 'X-LegalEntity' is missing. General.RequestHeaders.InvalidUsername                      =>        The provided application username from header 'X-Username' is not valid. General.InternalError                                       =>        Internal error occured. ApiOAuth.BadRequest                                         =>        Grant type (grant_type) was not provided correctly. ApiOAuth.InvalidCredentials                                 =>        Credentials(client_id and/or client_secret) are not valid. Ping.RequestModel.FieldMinimumLength                        =>        The length of {PropertyName} must be at least 3 characters. Ping.RequestModel.FieldHasNoDigit                            =>        The content of {PropertyName} must not contain any digits. GetPartners.RequestModel.FieldNotEmpty                      =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. GetPartners.RequestModel.ObjectNotFound                      =>        Partner filter code does not exist. GetPartners.RequestModel.DuplicateObjects                    =>        Partner filter codes are duplicated. GetPartners.PartnerFilter.FieldNotEmpty                      =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty for filter with 'FilterValue': {x.FilterValue}. GetPartners.PartnerFilter.FieldNotEmpty                      =>        The {{PropertyName}} field cannot be empty for filter with 'FilterCode': {x.FilterCode}. GetPartners.InvalidSearchFilters                            =>        The filter(s) should satisfy the next condition: {searchCondition.SearchConditionText}. GetPartner.RequestModel.MissingField(s)                      =>        Missing required field(s). 'PartnerId' or ('Origin' and 'BureauId') need to be provided. GetPartner.InvalidPartnerId                                 =>        The partnerId from request does not exist. GetAssetTypes.RequestModel.FieldNotEmpty                    =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. GetFinancialProductDefinitions.RequestModel-FieldNotEmpty   =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. GetFinancialProductDefinitions.InvalidQuoteId               =>        The provided quoteId is invalid. GetQuotePaymentSchedule.RequestModel-FieldNotEmpty          =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. GetScoreQuestions.RequestModel-FieldNotEmpty                =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. GetQuote.RequestModel-FieldNotEmpty                         =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. GetDocuments.RequestModel-FieldNotEmpty                     =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. UploadDocument.RequestModel-FieldNotEmpty                   =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. UploadDocument.ProductDocumentTemplate-FieldNotEmpty        =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. DownloadDocument.RequestModel-FieldNotEmpty                 =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. DownloadDocument.TemplateRequestModel-FieldNotEmpty         =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. DownloadDocument.DMSRequestModel-FieldNotEmpty              =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. DownloadDocument.DMSRequestModel-FieldWrong                 =>        The {PropertyName} is wrong. DownloadDocument.ProductDocumentTemplate-FieldNotEmpty      =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. DownloadDocument.InvalidTemplateId                          =>        The provided TemplateId is not valid for the given quote. QuoteManager.DownloadDocument-FieldNotEmpty                 =>        There is no financial product selected on quote QuoteManager.DownloadDocument-Failed                        =>        The template document could not be found. QuoteManager.DownloadDocument-MissingTemplate               =>        No template is available for download. SyncQuote.RequestModel.FieldNotEmpty                        =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. SyncQuote.RequestModel.FieldParentIdExists                  =>        The ParentExternalId field should reference to an existing ExternalId. SyncQuote.RequestModel.FieldNotNull                          =>        {PropertyName} should exist. SyncQuote.QuoteAsset.FieldNotEmpty                          =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. SyncQuote.SyncQuoteHeader.InvalidQuoteId                    =>        The quoteId from request does not exist.   SyncQuote.SyncQuoteHeader.ActionNotAllowed.0001              =>        Quote must have status with code NOFINPRD(No finance product) or INCCSTD(Incomplete customer data). SyncQuote.SyncQuoteHeader.ActionNotAllowed.0002              =>        Currency cannot be changed on a quote that has assets. SyncQuote.SyncQuoteHeader.ActionNotAllowed.0003              =>        Client cannot be changed on a quote that has assets. SyncQuote.SyncAssets.InvalidAssetNetPrice                    =>        The asset net price value must be greater than 0. SyncQuote.SyncAssets.InvalidAdditionalCosts                 =>        Additional costs can not be more than 10% of the asset price. SyncQuote.SyncAssets.InvalidManufacturingYear               =>        Manufacturing year has to be in the last 20 years. SyncQuote.SyncAssets.NoPossibleAssetsAvailable              =>        There are no assets configured and available for this currency ({currencyId}) and dealer ({dealerId}). SyncQuote.SyncAssets.AssetsNotAllowed                        =>        The assets on request do not match the possible assets for the given Quote for the selected currency and dealer. SyncQuote.SyncAssets.SupplierNotFound                        =>        The asset suppliers on request do not match the list of possible suppliers for the given Quote. SyncQuote.SyncAssets.MissingPriceCards                      =>        No valid common pricecard was found for the provided assets. SyncQuote.SyncProduct.PercentAndAmountNotAllowed            =>        The product has both the amount and the percent for Residual value or DownPayment. SyncQuote.SyncProduct.MissingProducts                        =>        There is no product that matches the product from the request. SyncQuote.SyncProduct.InterestTypeNotAllowed                =>        The interest type from the request does not match the interest type on the existing Product. SyncQuote.SyncProduct.DuplicatedServicesNotAllowed          =>        There are duplicated ServiceTypeIds for the given Product. SyncQuote.SyncProduct.ServicesNotAllowed                    =>        The services on request do not match the possbile services for the given Product. SyncQuote.SyncProduct.ServiceAmountNotAllowed                =>        There are services with an amount value that does not match the value interval configured in Charisma. StartApproval.RequestModel-FieldNotEmpty                    =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. StartApproval.RequestModel-FieldNotEmpty                    =>        The {{PropertyName}} field cannot be empty for question with 'QuestionCode' StartApproval.RequestModel-FieldNotEmpty                    =>        The {{PropertyName}} field cannot be empty for question with 'QuestionId' GetApproval.RequestModel-FieldNotEmpty                      =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. GetApproval.NoApprovalProcess                               =>        No approval operation was found for this quote. GenerateSepaMandate.RequestModel-FieldNotEmpty              =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. GetSepaMandate.GetDocumentNumber-ActionInterrupted          =>        The process of generate sepa mandate is interrupted by an error. QuoteManager.GetSepaMandateDocumentNumber-InvalidContract   =>        The requested contract is not generated from requested quote. StartApproval.QuoteStatusNotOK                              =>        The quote status is invalid for the operation. StartApproval.PreselectedProductMissing                     =>        There is no preselected product. StartApproval.AlreadyRunning                                =>        There is already a start approval operation in progress for this quote. StartContract.RequestModel-FieldNotEmpty                    =>        The {PropertyName} field cannot be empty. StartContract.RequestModel-MissingField(s)                  =>        The {PropertyName} is empty or missing required field(s). StartContract.RequestModel-FieldNotEmpty                    =>        The {{PropertyName}} field cannot be empty for asset with 'ExternalId' StartContract.RequestModel-FieldNotEmpty                    =>        The {{PropertyName}} field cannot be empty for asset with 'QuoteAssetId' QuoteManager.StartContract-NoPerson                         =>        The current user ({userName}) has no person attached in Charisma System. QuoteManager.StartContract-NoApprovedFile                   =>        The approved file does not exist for this quote. QuoteManager.StartContract-InvalidContractState             =>        The current file state '{StateName}' (state code: '{StateCode}') is not valid. 
                                                                      Valid states are: '{StateValidated.StateName}' (state code: '{StateValidated.StateCode}'), 
                                                                      '{StateAcceptedWithAdditionalConditions.StateName}' (state code: '{StateAcceptedWithAdditionalConditions.StateCode}').
QuoteManager.StartContract-GeneratedContract                =>        For the quote asset with ID = ({quoteAssetId}), contract has already been generated. QuoteManager.StartContract-NotGeneratedContract             =>        The contract was not generated. QuoteManager.StartContract-EmptyDetails                     =>        The approved file does not contain details."

correlationId.description: Response error correlation id. Intended to be used on investigations

partnerId.description: Partner identification number in the Charisma System

partnerCode.description: The code of the partner type from Charisma System.

partnerName.description: The name of the partner from Charisma System.

partnerTypeCode.description: The code of the partner type from Charisma System.

partnerTypeName.description: The name of the partner type from Charisma System.

nace.description: The main activity code for the NACE clasification.

creditLimit.description: The open amount, the unused limit from the facility frame.

limitValidUntil.description: The finish date of the facility frame.

bankName.description: The name of the bank from the partners default bank account.

bankAccount.description: The account from the partners default bank account.

ratingDate.description: The day when the rating was updated.

partnerAddressId.description: Partner address id in the Charisma System.

partnerId.description: Partner id in the Charisma System.

syntheticName.description: Is an identification name for the address for the corresponding partner.

stairNumber.description: Stair number for the building in the address.

cityCode.description: The code of the city from Charisma System.

cityName.description: The name of the city from Charisma System.

districtCode.description: The code of the district from Charisma System.

districtName.description: The name of the district from Charisma System.

countryCode.description: The code of the country from Charisma System.

countryName.description: The name of the country from Charisma System.

email.description: The email for the corresponding address.

contactPerson.description: The name of a contact person for the corresponding address.

quoteId.description: Quote identification number in the Charisma System

transactionId.description: Quote document number in Charisma System.

externalId.description: Quote identification number in provider environment

currencyId.description: 'The id of the currency in Charisma System.  Please see the annex *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Currency*, column *Id*. Values can also be found by calling */values/currency* (field: *Id*).'

currencyCode.description: The code of the currency in Charisma System. Values can be found by calling */values/currency* (field: *Code*).

partnerId.description: Partner identification number in the Charisma System for the quote client.

partnerName.description: Partner name in the Charisma System

purchaseOption.description:
'Possible values: 
  call-option: lessee decides whether he wants to buy the asset at the end of the contract
  put-option: lessor decides whether the lessee has to buy the asset at the end of the contract
Will be stored in new GST property in offer, CA, contract Purchase Option.'

paymentDay.description: Payment date of the month (SCB 1 or 15).

quoteAssetId.description: Asset quote id in the Charisma System

externalId.description: External asset id in provider environment

assetId.description: Asset id in the Charisma System

conditionTypeId.description: Condition type id of asset in Charisma System

environmentFriendlyTypeId.description: Environment friendly type id of asset in Charisma System. Values can be found by calling */values/environmentFriendly* (field *Id*).

environmentFriendlyTypeCode.description: Environment friendly type code of asset in Charisma System. Values can be found by calling */values/environmentFriendly* (field *Id*).

environmentFriendlyTypeName.description: Environment friendly type name of asset in Charisma System. Values can be found by calling */values/environmentFriendly* (field *Id*).

supplierId.description: Supplier id of asset. It is a partner id from Charisma System.

operatingArea.description: The area of operating. Geographical information where the trailer will be used

parentExternalId.description: ExternalId of asset parent, for which this asset is subasset

vendorModelNumber.description: Schmitz Bauartnummer (Vendor Model number) needs to be transfered to Charisma System in asset new GST property named Vendor model number.

quoteProductId.description: Quote product id in the Charisma System.

productId.description: Product id in the Charisma System.

duration.description: The duration of product in months.

interestTypeId.description: Id of interest type. Please see the dictionary values in Annex, excel file  *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Interest Type*, column  ID.

interestTypeCode.description: Code of interest type. Please see the dictionary values in Annex, excel file  *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Interest Type*, column  CODE.

interestTypeName.description: Name of interest type. Please see the dictionary values in Annex, excel file  *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Interest Type*, column  NAME.

serviceTypeId.description: Id of service type. Please see the Annex *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Service Type*, column *ID*. Values can also be found by calling */values/serviceType* (field *Id*).

serviceTypeCode.description: Code of service type. Please see the dictionary values in Annex, excel file  *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Service Type*, column CODE.

serviceTypeName.description: Name of service type. Please see the dictionary values in Annex, excel file  *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Service Type*, column NAME.

value.example: Hello John! Current application version is x.x.x.x.

items.description: Different properties are returned depending on the request param that is provided.

filterCode.description: 'Partner filter code. Allowed values can be found in the annex *Lists of property possible values*, sheet *ZootPartnerSearchConfigData*. Values can also be found by calling */values/zootPartnerSearchConfig* (field: *Code*).'

origin.description: The source system. The partner information can come from Charisma or Credit Bureau. If origin field contains *Charisma* then *partnerId* field is a required field, otherwise the *bureauId* field is required.

bureauId.description: The identification number of the Partner from Credit Bureau.

partnerId.description: The identification field of the Partner from Charisma System. The value for this field will not be provided if the partner information was retrieved directly from a credit bureau. In order to have this information provided an api call needs to be done with the method */partner*, provideing the *bureauId* and the *origin* values.

name.description: Partner name extracted from Charisma or Credit Bureau.

quoteId.description: The identification field of the quote from Charisma System. If this field is present then the coresponding quote will be updated, otherwise a new quote will be created and the new *quoteId* will be provided to the external system.

currencyId.description: 'The id of the currency in Charisma System.  Please see the annex *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Currency*, column *Id*. Values can also be found by calling */values/currency* (field: *Id*).'

partnerId.description: The id of the client partner from Charisma System.

externalId.description: The identification field of the quote from External System.

externalSalesman.description: Based on the last workshop meetings it was reached the conclusion that the vendor canâ€™t be saved as a partner automatically. In this case, it will be saved in the contract property *External Salesman*.

vendorRegionalBusinessManager.description: Based on the last workshop meetings it was reached the conclusion that the vendor canâ€™t be saved as a partner automatically. In this case, it will be saved in the contract property *Vendor regional business manager*.

vendorFinanceContact.description: Based on the last workshop meetings it was reached the conclusion that the vendor canâ€™t be saved as a partner automatically. In this case, it will be saved in the contract property *Vendor finance contact*.

purchaseOption.description:
'Possible values: 
  call-option: lessee decides whether he wants to buy the asset at the end of the contract
  put-option: lessor decides whether the lessee has to buy the asset at the end of the contract
Will be stored in new GST property in offer, CA, contract Purchase Option.'

paymentDay.description: Payment day of the month (SCB 1 or 15).

assets.description: This needs to be at least an empty array.

quoteAssetId.description: The identification field of the quote asset from Charisma System. If this field is present then the coresponding quote asset will be updated, otherwise a new quote asset will be created (and added on the quote) and the new *quoteAssetId* will be provided to the external system.

externalId.description: The identification field of the quote asset from External System.

assetId.description: The value of the *ModelId* field from Assets sheet (List of property possible values.xlsx). Values can also be found by calling */assetTypes?currencyId=${currency id from the quote}* (field *AssetId*) or by calling */quotes/${quote id from Charisma System}/assetTypes* (field *AssetId*).

conditionTypeId.description: Condition type id of asset in Charisma System. Values can be found by calling */values/conditionType* (field *Id*).

usageTypeId.description: Usage type id of asset in Charisma System. Values can be found by calling */values/usageType* (field *Id*).

environmentFriendlyTypeId.description: Environment friendly type id of asset in Charisma System. Values can be found by calling */values/environmentFriendly* (field *Id*).

supplierId.description: The id of the supplier partner from Charisma System.

operatingArea.description: The area of operating. Geographical information where the trailer will be used

parentExternalId.description: ExternalId of asset parent, for which this asset is a subasset.

vendorModelNumber.description: Schmitz Bauartnummer (Vendor Model number) needs to be transfered to Charisma System in asset new GST property named Vendor model number.

products.description: This needs to be at least an empty array.

quoteProductId.description: The identification field of the quote product from Charisma System. This needs to be provided if it is available in the external system.

productId.description: Product id from Charisma System. Please see the dictionary values in Annex, excel file List of Property possible values, sheet Type of Financial product, column ID

scheduleTypeId.description: Id of the schedule type from Charisma System. Values can be found by calling */values/scheduleType* (field *Id*).

downPaymentAmount.description: Down payment amount. Can not be provided in the same time with *downPaymentPercent* field.

downPaymentPercent.description: Down payment percent. Can not be provided in the same time with *downPaymentAmount* field.

residualValueAmount.description: Residual amount. Can not be provided in the same time with *residualValuePercent* field.

residualValuePercent.description: Residual percent. Can not be provided in the same time with *residualValueAmount* field.

duration.description: The filled duration for the product.

serviceTypeId.description: Id of service type. Please see the Annex *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Service Type*, column *ID*. Values can also be found by calling */values/serviceType* (field *Id*).

monthDate.description: The first date of the month for which the configurations are done. Used to identify the right month (cell or line) in the schedule.

params.description: List of params for the month that is configured.

scheduleTypeCellParamId.description: 'The Id of the parameter for which we are setting a value.  The list of available params depend on the selected schedule type and are preconfigured in Charisma System.  These are provided by the *Get quote products definitions operation*.'

value.description: The value that we are setting for that parameter. Here the type of this value is dynamic, depending on the param type.

items.description: This object contains product description fields.

productTypeId.description: Product type id in Charisma System. Please see the dictionary values in Annex, excel file List of Property possible values, sheet Type of Financial product, column ID

productTypeCode.description: Product type name in Charisma System.

productTypeName.description: Product type name in VCP. Please see the dictionary values in Annex, excel file List of Property possible values, sheet Type of Financial product, column Name

interestMinPercent.description: The minimum percentage of interest for the documents  (offer, credit, application, contract) with the corresponding product.

interestMaxPercent.description: The maximum percentage of interest for the documents  (offer, credit application, contract) with the corresponding product.

productDocumentTemplates.description: The list of document templates for the corresponding product.

id.description: Id of the product document template

requiredDocTypeId.description: Id of the required document type

requiredDocName.example: Copy of Identity Card for representatives

requiredDocTypeHasTemplate.description: States if there is a template file that can be downloaded for the required document.

scheduleTypes.description: The list of active schedule types for the correspondig product

scheduleTypeId.description: Id of the schedule type. Please see the dictionary values in Annex, excel file  *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Schedule Type product*, column ID.

scheduleTypeName.description: Name of the schedule type. Please see the dictionary values in Annex, excel file  *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Schedule Type product*, column NAME.

scheduleTypeCellParams.description: The list of the schedule type cell parameters for the corresponding schedule type

scheduleTypeCellParamId.description: Id of the schedule type cell parameter

cellParamTypeName.description: Name of the cell parameter type

cellParamDisplayName.description: Displayed name of the cell parameter

interestTypeId.description: Id of interest type. Please see the dictionary values in Annex, excel file  *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Interest Type*, column  ID.

interestTypeCode.description: Code of interest type. Please see the dictionary values in Annex, excel file  *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Interest Type*, column  CODE.

interestTypeName.description: Name of interest type. Please see the dictionary values in Annex, excel file  *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Interest Type*, column  NAME.

serviceTypeId.description: Id of service type. Please see the Annex *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Service Type*, column *ID*. Values can also be found by calling */values/serviceType* (field *Id*).

serviceTypeCode.description: Code of service type. Please see the dictionary values in Annex, excel file  *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Service Type*, column CODE.

serviceTypeName.description: Name of service type. Please see the dictionary values in Annex, excel file  *List of Property possible values*, sheet *Service Type*, column NAME.

items.description: List of components for each payment schedule.
The properties of each column in the payment schedule.
List of properties of the payment schedule item.
The properties of the payment schedule item.

columnCaption.description: The description from the definition of payment schedule.

columnName.description: The name from the definition of payment schedule.

displayFormat.description: The display format from definition of payment schedule.

systemTypeName.description: The system name from definition of payment schedule.

value.description: The value property is a object dynamic. The initialization is based on the type of value it receives.

items.description: The definition of each property of item.

displayFormat.description: It sets the display format of the information.

displayOrder.description: The display order in the schedule plan.

systemTypeName.description: The name of the system type.

scheduleTypeDetailId.description: The identification number of the detail in the schedule plan.

items.description: Each object from the list of questions.

variableTypeId.description: Here is set the type of the response. (e.g. open answer, a drop list of options). In this column is the Identification Number of the variable type.

options.description: List of options for the questions that donâ€™t have free text answers.

fromValue.description: Lower limit for the response of the question.

toValue.description: Upper limit for the response of the question.

orderNo.description: The order of the option in the answer list.

indicative.description: It states if the approval is final or just indicative.

questionId.description: Identification number for object. If *questionId* is not provided then *questionCode* becomes a mandatory field and can not be null.

questionCode.description: Question code for object.  If *questionCode* is not provided then *questionId* becomes a mandatory field and can not be null.

scoringId.description: The identification number of the approval calculation process.

status.description: The status of the approval process. Can be: WorkInProgress, Done.

scoringId.description: The identification number of the approval calculation process.

status.description: The status of the approval process. Can be: WorkInProgress, Done.

decision.description: Scoring decision taken in the method start approval (green, yellow, blue, red).  If the approval process is not finished this will not be available.

conditions.description: If the taken decision is yellow (approved with conditions), then should be returned the conditions. If the approval process is not finished this will not be available.

validDate.description: If a decision is taken then the date of the set decision must be returned. If the approval process is not finished this will not be available.

reasons.description: The reasons of the decision must be returned. If the approval process is not finished this will not be available.

activationDate.description: The date of the activation of the document.

documentStartDate.description: The start date of the document.

invoiceNumber.description: Before the activation the supplier payment must be done. The external  systemâ€™s number of the payment must be saved in VCP.

additionalAddress.description: All the details for an additional address for the contractâ€™s client.

externalId.description: The identification number of the asset in the external system.

serialNumber.description: The serial number or chassis number of the asset. Will be populated when  the document becomes contract.

contractId.description: The identification number of the contract.

limitAmount.description: Maximum amount that can be debited.

productDocumentTemplate.description: The document template for which the file is uploaded.  This is provided by the *getDocuments* operation (note that the *uploadedFiles* property from *productDocumentTemplate* is not provided).
The document template which will be downloaded.  This is provided by the *getDocuments* operation (note that the *uploadedFiles* property from *productDocumentTemplate* does not need to be provided).

contentType.name: Content-Type
contentType.description: The content type header of the request. Must be always sent for POST and PUT requests. The value should be: *application/json*.

requestId.name: X-RequestId
requestId.description: Unique identifier used in order to uniquely identify the api call

countryCode.name: X-CountryCode
countryCode.description: Country code for which the call is done. VCP related.

vendorCode.name: X-VendorCode
vendorCode.description: Vendor code for which the call is done. VCP related.

username.name: X-Username
username.description: Username of the person using the system. VCP related.

legalEntity.name: X-LegalEntity
legalEntity.description: Legal entity of the user from the External System.

quoteId.name: quoteId
quoteId.description: The id of the quote in Charisma System.
